message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of making an offer of $120. Can you consider that?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer it to you for $135. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $135 is a bit steep. I'm willing to go up to $125. Can you consider that?
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I really need to make a profit on this one. I can do $130, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I'm still trying to get a good deal, and I'm willing to go up to $128. Can you meet me there?
I'm glad we're close, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you at $128, but I need to make a bit more than that. How about we say $132?
I'm close to giving up, but I really want this product. I'm willing to meet you at $129. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to give a bit more, but I need to make a fair profit. How about we meet at $131?
